followUp.doNotCheckOverruling: Do not respect priority of current state
followUp.doNotCheckOverrulingInfo: Normally the follow-up state will only be set if it is either a priority, or if the current state is not a priority. By checking this option, the state will be set anyhow.
followUp.nextActionInfo: The follow-up action will only be performed if your follow-up state can be set with respect to the current state's priority. If you have not specified a follow-up state, the follow-up action will be performed anyhow.
